name: Pertti the Poltergeist Purger
description:
"In a small town, an old castle has been put up for sale. The real estate firm tasked with selling it have had no luck because the rumours say that it's haunted. Therefore, they have decided to hire a professional to investigate the castle and take care of eventual problems.

Unfortunately the Ghostbusters™ were too busy to take on the job (and they would have been rather expensive as well), so they hired the next best thing: YOU!"

This is a short (5–15 minutes) first-person horror shooter experience with some comedic elements. It is a project that was developed in May 2022 for a university course. I have no prior coding related experience, so don't expect it to be DUSK, BioShock or L4D2. 🙂 All that said, it is in the end a fully functional gaming experience – give it a go if your interest was piqued!
